subject: style(charts): add bg=transparent to repo-tor embed URLs
body:
Chart iframe backgrounds now inherit the card's bg-surface color
instead of repo-tor's default #1B1B1B, eliminating the visible
mismatch between chart backgrounds and the site's dark theme.

Tags: charts, embed, theming
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: activity-charts
Semver: patch
